name: Heartbeat 2092
description:
It's Valentine's day 2092. You're a hacker, and you want to send your girl a Valentine's message she won't forget. Good luck.

** Click inside game to focus window **

The game was created for Godot Wild Jam 30 with the theme "Heartbeat".

Controls
In the menus, follow the on screen instructions.

In game, use UP / DOWN arrows. ESC to abort level.


Wildcards
None
